definition: (of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
feeling/emotion/passion/situation
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
pleased

sentences.english: I think the young love can sometimes be the most important.
sentences.chinese: 但是我想真愛的關鍵在於兩情相悅。

sentences.english: The two lovers exchange solemn vows and pledges without any impurity.
sentences.chinese: 兩情相悅海誓山盟沒有任何雜質的感情。

sentences.english: Warm coffee pleases you and me.
Love is not the two lovers, will have a reduced wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 愛情沒能兩情相悅，必然會有一個人淪落荒野。

sentences.english: Be patient, wait for the right one.
sentences.chinese: 耐心一點，等待那個真正兩情相悅的人吧。

sentences.english: The two lovers happy, always has the heroic sacrifice oneself.
sentences.chinese: 兩情相悅的幸福，背後總有自我犧牲的悲壯。

definition: (to live together until the) white hairs of old age (idiom); to live to a ripe old age in conjugal bliss/until death do us part
to love each other
to treat each other as an honored guest (idiom)/mutual respect between husband and wife
to obstinately persist in going about things the wrong way (idiom)
to be kind and love one another (idiom); bound by deep emotions
lit. thin streams flow forever/fig. economy will get you a long way/to work steadily at something little by little
stuck together as by glue (of lovers)/joined at the hip
to both be willing/mutual consent
lit. to like the new, and hate the old (idiom); fig. enamored with new people (e.g. new girlfriend), bored with the old
better to have nothing (than substandard choice) (idiom); would prefer to go without than accept shoddy option
to put oneself in sb else's shoes (idiom)
the families are well-matched in terms of social status (idiom)/(of a prospective marriage partner) an appropriate match
love at first sight (idiom)
good karma/opportune connection with marriage partner
affectionate/an affectionate person
single-minded/concentrated
